creator: dongsheng@apache.org
text:
In the page: http://httpd.apache.org/docs/trunk/howto/ There is a non-exists page reference: See: Access Control [1] [1] http://httpd.apache.org/docs/trunk/howto/access.html diff --git a/docs/manual/howto/index.xml b/docs/manual/howto/index.xml index d7d79b4..f60be63 100644 --- a/docs/manual/howto/index.xml +++ b/docs/manual/howto/index.xml @@ -49,7 +49,7 @@ are a variety of different ways that this can be accomplished.

-

See: Access Control

+

creator: rbowen@apache.org
text: Thanks for pointing this out. Rather than removing the link, I've added the missing document in, in r1070859. I copied it over from the 2.2 docs, and then updated it for trunk syntax. It could use a review and more examples.
